DOC.brief_summary: The propose research study aim conduct culturally-based secondary prevention intervention target toward HIV-positive Black young men sex men ( B-YMSM ) explore ( 1 ) feasibility acceptability ( Trial 1 Trial 2 ) ( 2 ) evidence potential efficacy ( Trial 2 ) . The primary outcome health promotion behavior ( i.e. , treatment adherence , sexual risk reduction , reduction substance use behavior , HIV status disclosure ) . Psychosocial factor ( i.e . self-esteem , critical consciousness , socio-political awareness ) examine secondary outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Testing Secondary Prevention Intervention HIV-Positive Black Young Men Who Have Sex With Men
DOC.detailed_description: First , protocol team finalize development manualization Health 4 Life ( H4L ) comparison intervention , serve basis comparison Mobilizing Our Voices Empowerment ( MOVE ) , treatment intervention . H4L health promotion life skill intervention account time attention . Following protocol team implement Trial 1 . In trial , intervention specialist `` peer buddy '' ( intervention co-facilitator ) one AMTU conduct one wave MOVE H4L . The team conduct analysis process data revise two intervention ( MOVE H4L ) . Upon revise intervention , protocol team implement Trial 2 . In trial , protocol co-chairs interventionist Trial 1 train interventionists peer buddy four new AMTUs ; interventionists peer buddy run revise MOVE H4L intervention . Each site designate either treatment comparison site , conduct two wave assign intervention . The team time conduct data analysis modify manualize final version MOVE H4L .
DOC.criteria: To consider eligible enrollment Trial 1 Trial 2 , individual must meet criterion list : Receives service one select AMTU sit one community partner ; Biological male birth self identifies male gender time consent ; Self identify `` Black '' ( include Black/AfricanAmerican , Black Latino , Black/AfroCaribbean , Black/African immigrant , selfidentified member African Diaspora ) ; HIVinfected document medical record review verification refer medical professional ; Between age 1624 year , inclusive , time consent ; HIVinfected sexual behavior ; At least one sexual encounter involve oral anal sex male partner past year ; Ability understand write spoken English ; Willingness participate groupbased intervention HIVpositive BYMSM agree respect privacy group member ; Willingness ability attend first group session date choose site staff ; Willingness provide sign informed consent assent parental/legal guardian permission applicable . To consider eligible enrollment , individual must meet criterion list . Active psychiatric condition opinion site personnel would interfere ability give true informed consent adhere study requirement ; Visibly distraught and/or visibly emotionally unstable ( i.e. , exhibit suicidal , homicidal , violent behavior ) ; Active drug alcohol use dependence , opinion site personnel , would interfere ability give true informed consent adhere study requirement ; Acute illness , opinion treat clinician , would interfere participant 's ability adhere protocol requirement and/or interfere protocol objective . Previous participation ATN 090 , `` Development Secondary Prevention Intervention Targeting HIVPositive Black Young Men Who Sex Men . '' ( NOTE : YAB member ATN090 participate ATN 104 ) Previous participation Trial 1 ATN104 ; Current enrollment behavioral intervention study program . Any case uncertain require Protocol Team approval .
